net.tridentsdk.api.entity.living

Interface Horse

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Ageable, Entity, Impalable, InventoryHolder, LivingEntity, Peaceful, ProjectileSource, Saddleable, Tameable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TridentHorse

    public interface Horse
extends Tameable, Saddleable, InventoryHolder, Peaceful
    Represents a Horse

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HorseType getBreed()
      What breed of horse this is
      int getTemper()
      The temper of this horse, higher temper dictates that the horse is easier to tame
      HorseVariant getVariant()
      The variant of this horse, will return an invalid variant if this horse is not of a HORSE breed
      boolean hasChest()
      Whether or not this horse has a chest
      boolean isGrazing()
      Whether or not this horse is grazing

    • Method Detail

      • getBreed

        HorseType getBreed()
        What breed of horse this is
        Returns:
        the HorseType that represents this breed

      • isGrazing

        boolean isGrazing()
        Whether or not this horse is grazing
        Returns:
        if this horse is grazing or not

      • getTemper

        int getTemper()
        The temper of this horse, higher temper dictates that the horse is easier to tame
        Returns:
        the temper of this horse. Range of 0-100

      • hasChest

        boolean hasChest()
        Whether or not this horse has a chest
        Returns:
        false if this horse's breed is not a donkey or mule, or this horse has no chest

      • getVariant

        HorseVariant getVariant()
        The variant of this horse, will return an invalid variant if this horse is not of a HORSE breed
        Returns:
        the variant of this horse
